contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1903 D Altofts Contest
Altofts Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
altofts-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Altofts, Normanton, West Yorkshire Test piece - choice of Seraglio or Scottish Memories.Prizes - 1st £7, 2nd £4, 3rd £2.10s., 4th £1.10s. March contest - 1st(£1) Rothwell, 2nd(10s.) Armley & Wortley. Promoted by Altofts West Riding Band. 9 bands competed.
June 11, 2013, 3:30 a.m. Jan. 8, 2020, 11:07 p.m.
